net.beaconcontroller.tutorial

Class LearningSwitchTutorialSolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.beaconcontroller.tutorial.LearningSwitchTutorialSolution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOFMessageListener, IOFSwitchListener

    public class LearningSwitchTutorialSolution
extends Object
implements IOFMessageListener, IOFSwitchListener
    Tutorial class used to teach how to build a simple layer 2 learning switch.
    Author:
    David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu) - 10/14/12

                OFPacketIn pi)

      • forwardAsLearningSwitch

        public void forwardAsLearningSwitch(IOFSwitch sw,
                           OFPacketIn pi)
                             throws IOException
        Learn the source MAC:port pair for each arriving packet, and send packets out the port previously learned for the destination MAC of the packet, if it exists. Otherwise flood the packet similarly to forwardAsHub.
        Parameters:
        sw - the OpenFlow switch object
        pi - the OpenFlow Packet In object
        Throws:
        IOException
